title: Bash vs Zsh Comparison
description: Interactive two-column comparison infographic showing the strengths and weaknesses of Bash and Zsh shells with star ratings, hover tooltips, and a Venn diagram illustrating their common ground.
creator: Learning Linux Course
subject: shell comparison
bash
zsh
command line
terminal
Linux shells
learningObjective: Help students understand the key differences between Bash and Zsh to make informed choices about which shell to use.
